thread.section_title: Eagle Optics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Eagle Optics | www.eagleoptics.com | 3 of 113
thread.title: Patrick P
thread.title_full: Eagle Optics reviewed by Patrick P

author: Patrick P
title: Patrick P
text: Eagle optics did not have the item that I desired in stock, but recommended a suitable replacement. The price was a bit higher than what I had hoped to pay, but I was grateful for the help and efficient service. These folks have the expertise and, according to friends honor all sales.
